title: C-MAX - Chrono-Max SmartWatch (Pink)
description: "C-MAX – The next generation in ChronoWatch! Over a dozen different features now on a MAX 1.69” FULL COLOR, TOUCHSCREEN DISPLAY. Never miss a call, chat, or text when you get the alert right to your watch. See what the weather is like with one quick swipe. Control your music or audiobook playback, and track your sleep, fitness, and health vitals all on your wrist. The soft, flexible, silicone band makes C-MAX comfortable to wear all-day, every-day! KEY FEATURES & FUNCTIONS: Message &Calls Alerts Weather Sleep Monitoring Music/Playback Controls Stopwatch Screen Brightness Adjustment Multi-Sport Fitness Tracking Health Monitors Alarms & Activities Reminders Remote Camera Shutter Find Watch Alert Changeable Watch Face SPECIFICATIONS: Screen Type: 1.69” TFT Battery: 190mAh IP67 Waterproof: up to 1m of brief immersion; Dust, Sweat, and Splash Proof System Requirements: iOS 8.0+ / Android 5.1+ Charging Time: 3 hours Phone APP Interface: Da fit INCLUDED: 1x C-MAX SmartWatch 1x USB Charging Cable (adapter plug not included) 1x User’s Manual AVAILABLE COLORS: Black, Teal, Pink, Rose Gold NOTE: This watch does NOT replace any medical device and is not advertised as such. Official medical equipment used by trained personnel should be used in the process of diagnosis and treatment. Please consult a physician with any blood pressure issues and confirm readings with a certified medical device. In case of allergic reaction or discomfort while wearing the watch, immediately discontinue wearing it and consult a physician accordingly."
